com.tedros.core.context

Class TedrosContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tedros.core.context.TedrosContext

  • public final class TedrosContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Tedros Context The main context, responsible to loading apps, process, user, messages, language and security settings.
    Author:
    Davis Gordon

    • Property Summary

      Properties
